Articles.Content: This is an issue I have been encountering ever since I got my new laptop. When playing the game, I am unable to use most of the features that are activated with the function keys, like the flight log or debug menu. The function keys on my laptop all have other uses (e.g. f7 lowers volume, f12 turns on airplane mode, etc) so you have to use the fn key to use it as a function key. In most other games, this works fine and pressing fn+f7 allows the key to work as normal. But for some reason, KSP is the only game where this doesn't work. The only key that actually works is f5 to quicksave, for some reason. Like I said, this isn't a problem in any other games so it doesn't seem to be a problem with my computer. I have also tried using a bluetooth keyboard with dedicated function keys and that did not work either. If anybody knows what's wrong or how to fix it, please let me know

14 hours ago, dunalipa said:

In most other games, this works fine and pressing fn+f7 allows the key to work as normal. But for some reason, KSP is the only game where this doesn't work.

Not likely but do you have GeForce Experience overlay or any overlay enabled?

Its the only thing i could find about this, also try holding Alt+FN+F7 but i doubt it.

Hopefully someone can help a bit more.

Edited March 26, 2021 by Serenity
